sections.paragraph: பின்னும், இன்னும், பெருகாதபடி, விடாமல், மேலும், இனி, வேறு, அப்புறம், இப்போது, மட்டும், உள்ளே, போது, பெருகு - வினையடை
a going round, continuance, still, yet, again, besides

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From H5749; properly iteration or continuance; used only adverbially (with or without preposition), again, repeatedly, still, more: - again, X all life long, at all, besides, but, else, further (-more), henceforth, (any) longer, (any) more (-over), X once, since, (be) still, when, (good, the) while (having being), (as, because, whether, while) yet (within).
Cognate: H5707, H5713, H5715, H5749, H5750, H5752, H8584
